a whale suddenly appeared nearby.
On the beach in Australia, many tourists

expressed
concern about the incident that happened on Saturday morning at
Lon Beach near the city of Per, according to

As many people approached the

could be dangerous for both people

swam out to use the water.  Experts
said that the above behavior of the whale is
unusual and dangerous and could lead to
dry eyes. They also added that the best thing
to do in situations like this
is not to get close to the whale and leave it alone.  This

morning, Thuan An city police
examined the scene at a
temporary hut where a man died after
a night of drinking with a group of
friends. According to initial information last night,
a group of people held a party at a temporary hut
in an empty lot on Binh
Chuan Street 62, Binh Chuan Ward, Thuan City.
After the party ended, everyone went
home, but Mr. Bui Minh Tuat from Binh Duong
and Mr. Vo Van Tung from Kien Giang slept
in the upper house at about 5:00 this morning.
He woke up and discovered that Mr.
Tung was dead to investigate.  Initially, it was said that
the people who participated in last night's drinking party did
not have a job or a stable residence.
This group of people just built a corrugated
iron house here to live.

Arrested, Ham Thuan Bac district police,
Binh Thuan province, are handling the case of this
property robbery and
working with the investigation agency to investigate the person
responsible for the robbery. They said that due to lack of
money to pay the debt, he intended to
rob.  property on December 9. The
subject wore a jacket, a mask and
used tape to tape the license plate and then
rode a motorbike to a gold shop in
Sara market in Ham Duc commune. Pretending to ask to buy two
gold rings, he took advantage of the owner.  The gold shop had a
loophole and was an elderly man who
robbed two rings and then got into the car to escape. The
stolen property was taken to
another gold shop, where he sold nearly 5.4 million
VND, then paid off the debt and spent it on personal expenses.  The
Phu Yen Provincial Police Department said they had just
handled administrative violations of three subjects for the
act of manufacturing and storing guns and buying and selling
homemade guns.
Previously, the Provincial Police discovered three
subjects, including Nguyen Thanh Nhan Nguyen
Minh Hai.  and Nguyen Dinh Phuc, both living in
Phu Yen, had the act of buying, selling, and storing guns, selling
homemade guns online. Checking the whereabouts
of the subjects, the police force
confiscated two homemade gun magazines, more than
38 weapons, ammunition, and other means.  The
equipment used to make bullets for the
above three subjects was fined 62 million VND by the police department of
administrative management and social order of Phu Yen province.
Continuing the success of last year's
